Given your ears some rest?

🔥 SATURDAY | June 2 🔥
❌ ❌ ❌ ❌ ❌ ❌ ❌ ❌
2030 STOP ASKING STUPID QUESTIONS (RUS | Stauropygial)
the guru from the St. Petersburg noise underground
will teach you how to cope sonically – with even a rather humble budget
🔊 http://stauropygial.org
🔊 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nu45cacIy2s

2100 URGE (F)
spontaneous choppings on guitar, sax and drums
“at last I am free”
🔊 https://soundcloud.com/urge-caen
🔊 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sPVbVFTS4Rc

2145 HORST DU NOCH (F | retrofutur)
all you need is a guitar, a machine drum and unorthodox desires
solo and trve as anything!
🔊 https://horstdunoch.bandcamp.com
🔊 https://soundcloud.com/horst-du-noch

2230 DAME AREA (ES | Màgia Roja)
extensive electronic trips
total banger, really!
🔊 https://damearea.bandcamp.com
🔊 http://magiarojabcn.bandcamp.com

2315 WETWARE (USA | Dais Records)
THE (!!) neo/future-industrial group from NYC
throbbing, psychic, coiling
🔊 https://wetware-nyc.bandcamp.com
🔊 https://primitivelanguages.bandcamp.com/album/wetware-s-t
🔊 https://daisrecords.bandcamp.com

0000 ZOO (ID | Yes No Wave Music)
just your everyday Indonesian prog/zeuhl/avant/math outfit
(this stuff’s actually more than a single human mind can handle)
🔊 http://www.rullyshabara.id/zoo
🔊 https://soundcloud.com/zooindonesia
🔊 http://tenzenmen.com/artists/zoo
🔊 https://zoo-indonesia.bandcamp.com

0045 DEUX BOULES VANILLE (F | Kythibong)
familiar faces in the noise society
super-tasty trigger drums and exotically-flavoured synths
🔊 http://www.2boulesvanille.com
🔊 https://deuxboulesvanille.bandcamp.com
🔊 http://soundcloud.com/deux-boules-vanille

0130 PETER JAMES TAYLOR (UK | Fortissimo Records)
Action Beat’s head shaman invites us all to his mass
guitars guitars guitars repeat repeat repeat (✝R.I.P. Glenn Branca✝)
🔊 https://peterjamestaylor.net
🔊 https://peterjtaylor.bandcamp.com

0215 SALSA (F | MMODEMM)
dos bolas de vainilla
drum sequences and analog synths—kick it!
🔊 https://soundcloud.com/salsa-ohyeah
🔊 https://mmodemm.bandcamp.com/album/mdm-c

0330 ROLAND MOOG (F)
in-depth trips into French sonicisms
and beyond and beyond and beyond
🔊 https://soundcloud.com/valentine-torque
